methods.name: create
methods.summary: Creates a status for the currently logged in user.
methods.description:
Requires user login.

See Users: Create a Status for the request parameters supported by this method.

Data is returned in the statuses property of the parameter passed to the callback.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
